body.name: MOPALL Mop and Bucket with Wringer Set,Large Flat Floor Mop and Bucket,16'' Flat Mop and Narrow Bucket with 4 Microfiber Pads,Wet and Dry Use,Household Cleaning Tools for All Floor Types and Windows
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 33 mins
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 3 hrs 33 mins
features: PROFESSIONAL FLAT MOP AND BUCKET SYSTEM🏘️Our mop bucket is a game-changer when it comes to floor cleaning.MOPALL mop and bucket with wringer set contains 7 rainbow blade （One cleaning scraper, six floating roller）to speed up the cleaning of dirty mops.This floor mop have two compartments to separate dirty water from the clean water.The flat mop can be placed completely in the bucket.The vibrant rainbow color scheme also adds a touch of vibrancy to your cleaning routine.

EFFICIENT and QUICK CLEANING with 16-INCH FLAT MOP HEAD🏘️Anyone will appreciate a more time-saving mop and bucket.MOPALL easy squeeze mop and bucket system comes with a 16" flat mop head.Length of handle is adjustable.In addition the mop head contains metal and plastic cap protectors where the mop head is attached, making the mop more durable.Compared to other shorter flat mops and round microfiber mops, our mop can save half the cleaning time for the same cleaning area.

SLIM BUCKET PERFECTLY SUITED FOR NARROW SPACES🏘️ This mop bucket with wringer is 5.7" wide,Definitely one of the best choices for those seeking perfect storage and small apartments.Easy to assemble,Tall and narrow so not to waste cleaner.All parts are compact enough to fit effortlessly inside the bucket.easy to store.

MULTI-USE HOUSEHOLD CLEANING TOOLS🏘️MOPALL hardwood floor mop has many more uses.Dusting Paper Can Be Installed Design-More efficient cleaning of hair as well as dust on walls.Soft Rubber Scraper Strip design-Mop back squeegee strip design, bathroom water stains and small pool water stains will be clean with a gentle scrape.Mop Front Scraper Design-The front most Scraper of the mop is designed to clean solid stains（like chewing gum)on the floor.

4PCS WASHABLE COMPOSITE MICROFIBER MOPS PAD🎁Our mop pads consist of three layers of material-Water-Repellent Fiber Layer/Water-Absorbent Sponge Layer /Powerful Stain Removal Layer.They work well in the washer and dryer.with excellent water absorption that makes it perfect for wet and dry cleaning.

STURDY CONSTRUCTION and EASY HANDLING 🏘️Our mop is built to last. Constructed with high-quality ABS and PP materials, it offers supreme strength and durability. The mop pole is made from stainless steel, ensuring a strong load-bearing capacity while providing a comfortable grip. The metal linker used for connecting the mop head guarantees long-lasting performance. Additionally, our mop bucket features an easy-to-use buckle setting, making disassembly and installation a breeze.

IMPORTANT NOTE❤️mop can rotate 360 degrees.The bottom of the mop contains 8 suction cups, and when you use the mop bucket, the bucket will stand very stable on the floor with the help of the suction cups. If you want to fully immerse the mop for cleaning, the water level line is at the horizontal line at the bottom of the rainbow scraper.Make sure the drain plug at the bottom is well sealed before use.

productInformation.value: #29,448 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #11 in Household Mops & Bucket Sets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I mop the floors I hate the fact that the water gets dirty after couple rounds and either you have to change the water frequently or you end up using dirty water. Also I hate touching the dirty mop head. This mop set is amazing. I just received my set today. I have a big house with both dark cherry color hard wood floors and tile floor in the kitchen. I moped the first floor in no time. After you are done there is a valve you just pull it and the water just pours easily. It has vacuum suction underneath it so it doesn’t flip. And it is very slim. It doesn’t take a lot of space when you don’t using it. It was an amazing experience. I already recommended it my friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This thing works great once you research how to properly essemble it
reviews.reviewText: The mop works great and I love the 2 separate sections for dirty and clean water. I think it's a bit overpriced as far as quality.My two main negative issues is that this mop was sent to someone else, returned, and repackaged. The small box inside the big box has someone else's name and address on it, so I wasn't the first person to buy this mop. I paid $50 for a mop that is a return item when it should have been new.The other issue was the lack of assembly instructions. I had to watch videos about how to put this thing together. There is a trick to putting the mop head on the mop properly so it will work, and without knowing that, this product would be useless.This mop is lightweight and easy to use otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and dirty water!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a mop that will reduce pushing dirt around and just using dirty water to clean. I was sold on this after watching the review videos and them showing using one side for dirty water and one side for soapy water.It was very easy to assemble and even though instructions weren’t included. I filled one side with hot water (to clean the mop which would be the dirty side) and one side with hot soapy water. I also placed the combo scrubber on the dirty water side to help clean the mopping pad.It is a very large pad but not too large you can’t control the scrub. The dual sides worked perfectly. My dirty water and the scrubber kept all the dirt out of the soapy water.The drain plug on the back was sturdy and stayed in place. I did the paper towel test after cleaning in a very high traffic area and there was still some dirt however the floors look clean and I have 3 dogs and 2 kids so a little dirt is part of life but this mop bucket combo I think will help me keep up with cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good concept however
reviews.reviewText: Upon assembling mop, I noticed the top of the mop had a thin crack where you place your hands to the handle. I do love the concept. Just wish it didn’t come damaged. Also when wringing the mop the top half doesn’t completely submerge leaving the dirt on it. I had to remove microfiber and turn it to get the other end submerged and wring it dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mop bucket fails on all points
reviews.reviewText: I like another person did not use right away, bucket to heavy after filled in laundry room sink to lift, 1st fail. The mop bucket and squeegees does not work properly, 2nd fail. The bucket does not suction well to my tile as it has a texture and not like glass surface, 3rd fail. Without and directions or diagrams I did not know mop pads have to be attached on both ends not just on the Velcro, 4th fail. This product is a waste of time an money, it lands in my pile of stuff to throw away…...I do not know why the seller reading these negative reviews does not respond to them here

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It Leaks, But overall Okay.
reviews.reviewText: This would have been the perfect mop for me as my house if not the biggest. I had the perfect spot in my bathroom between my sink and toilet for it to go. I wanted to keep at least the clean water in the bucket at all times, while only draining the dirty water after each use. Well that was short lived as I noticed one day there wasn't ANY water in the clean side and I had a huge mess now on the floor. I was confused...Wasn't no way that it leaked. It's BRAND NEW. So I tried it again, left the clean water side half full. An hour later, water started pooling on the floor again. The leak isn't THAT bad, but you sure can't leave it in the bucket after use. I started placing the bucket in the tub from now on to prevent any future leaks while it's drying after use. Overall, I love the mop. Just wish I could get a new bucket...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This works just as well as a swifer without needing to constantly change the cloth! It doesn’t have instructions but it’s so easy to set up that it doesn’t need it, took me less than 3 minutes to set up. Been using it close to a month now and there are no signs of it breaking. Also super easy to clean once you’re done. (Fyi, when pulling the plug to empty the water, the current will be strong)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Slim Mop and Bucket
reviews.reviewText: Looks good and seems to be a good fit for saving space. Since this was purchased as a gift, I cannot effectively review it's effectiveness
